arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho grabs Okan Buruk's face as Fenerbahce vs Galatasaray cup tie ends in chaos
arts.sum: A bizarre incident at the end of a Turkish Cup clash

arts.ttl: Mourinho accused of 'physically attacking' Galatasaray boss
arts.sum: Galatasaray accuse Fenerbahce boss Jose Mourinho of "physically attacking" their manager Okan Buruk after appearing to grab his nose.

arts.ttl: Mourinho involved in wild bust-up after Fenerbahce defeat to Galatasaray
arts.sum: Jose Mourinho grabbed rival manager Okan Buruk's face amid wild scenes at the end of Fenerbahce's 2-1 Turkish Cup defeat against rivals Galatasaray.

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho in bizarre bust-up after Fenerbahce’s cup defeat to Galatasaray
arts.sum: Mourinho’s Fenerbahce are six points behind Galatasaray

arts.ttl: Fenerbahce boss Mourinho loses temper in fiery Istanbul derby
arts.sum: Jose Mourinho has been no stranger to controversy during his coaching career and the ‘Special One’ might just be in hot water again. Mourinho’s Fenerbahce side lost a tempestuous Istanbul derby to arch-rivals Galatasaray this evening, as Victor Osimhen’s secured the latter a 2-1 win in the Turkish Cup. Sebastian Szymański pulled one back before […] The post Fenerbahce boss Mourinho loses temper in fiery Istanbul derby first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho faces mega football ban as Fenerbahce boss grabs Galatasaray rival by the NOSE before he decks it
arts.sum: Mourinho was chased down by his own players but it did little to stop The Special One as red mist descended
